name: Balloon War (cenullum)
description:
Cenker Cennet and Hamit Akbaş made this game as university final project. We tried to clone 3d version of retro game Balloon Fight with Unreal Engine 4.25.4. You can also check project files out.

In game there 3 levels and by passing those levels you win the game. You need to pop enemies' balloons up to go to next level. Bubbles out when the enemy falls into the water don't forget to collect them and coins for extra points

Also watch out for the fish and lightning , if you are too close to the water the fish may catch you or if you are touched by lightning, lose one life point.
